trans-unit.source: Defines an array of colors that make up a color palette.
trans-unit.target: 定义组成调色板的颜色的数组。

trans-unit.source: The colors are 32-bit ARGB colors.
trans-unit.target: 这些颜色是 32 位 ARGB 颜色。

trans-unit.source: Not inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 不可继承。

trans-unit.source: You are not allowed to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette> object directly.
trans-unit.target: 不允许你构造<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette>直接对象。

trans-unit.source: If you created a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette> object, you could then manipulate the palette size for a particular image, which is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette>对象，就可以操作的特定映像，这不允许的调色板大小。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Palette%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain a <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Palette%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来获取<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette>对象。

trans-unit.source: The colors in the palette are limited to 32-bit ARGB colors.
trans-unit.target: 调色板中的颜色仅限于 32 位 ARGB 颜色。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit ARGB color has 8 bits each for alpha, red, green, and blue values.
trans-unit.target: 32 位 ARGB 颜色具有各 8 位 alpha、 红色、 绿色和蓝色值。

trans-unit.source: The lowest 8 bits make up the blue bit, the next 8 bits are green, the next 8 bits are red, and the most significant 8 bits are alpha.
trans-unit.target: 最低的 8 位构成的蓝色位、 的下一步的 8 位均为绿色，接下来的 8 位有红色、 和的最重要的 8 位均为字母。

trans-unit.source: This means each component can vary from 0 to 255.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着每个组件可能会因 0 到 255 之间。

trans-unit.source: Fully on is 255 and fully off is 0.
trans-unit.target: 完全为 255，并且完全关闭时为 0。

trans-unit.source: Alpha is used to make the color value transparent (alpha = 0) or opaque (alpha = 255).
trans-unit.target: Alpha 用于使颜色值变为透明 (字母 = 0) 或不透明 (字母 = 255)。

trans-unit.source: The number of intensity levels in the image can be increased without increasing the number of colors used.
trans-unit.target: 在图中的强度级别数可以增加而无需增加使用的颜色数。

trans-unit.source: This process creates what is called a halftone, and it offers increased contrast at a cost of decreased resolution.
trans-unit.target: 此过程将创建所谓的半色调，并提供提高的对比度，但降低分辨率为代价。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 结构的数组。

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that make up this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette" />.
trans-unit.target: 组成此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette" /> 结构的数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies how to interpret the color information in the array of colors.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个指定如何解释颜色数组中的颜色信息的值。

trans-unit.source: The following flag values are valid:
trans-unit.target: 下面的标志值有效：

trans-unit.source: The color values in the array contain alpha information.
trans-unit.target: 该数组中的颜色值包含 alpha 信息。

trans-unit.source: The colors in the array are grayscale values.
trans-unit.target: 该数组中的颜色是灰度值。

trans-unit.source: The colors in the array are halftone values.
trans-unit.target: 该数组中的颜色是半色调值。
